get.summary: Handles the callback from OAuth provider.
get.description: Processes the callback from the OAuth provider, handling authorization and redirection.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The authorization code returned by the OAuth provider.

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Error message returned by the OAuth provider if the authorization fails.

302.description: Redirects user to either the login process page or an error page.

Location.description: The URL to which the user is redirected.

get.summary: Handles the login process after OAuth callback.
get.description: Uses the authorization code to fetch tokens, retrieve user data, and store them in a cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The encrypted key generated from the authorization code.

200.description: Returns user data on successful login.

handle.description: The user's handle or username on the provider platform.

avatar_url.description: The URL of the user's avatar image.

profile_url.description: The URL of the user's profile.

provider_user_id.description: The user's ID as provided by the OAuth provider.

401.description: Unauthorized due to invalid login credentials or missing provider.
